import React from 'react' import dataShop from '../db/dataShop' import Rating from './Rating' export default function productScreen(props) { const product=dataShop.products.find(x=> x._id=== props.match.params.id)//this value is the one the user inserts if(!product){ return
Product not found
} return (
  • {product.name}
  • Price:{product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
) }
